column4: hey, my window decorations sometimes don't redraw properly. I'm using Intrepid with the proprietary nvidia drivers, and desktop effects enabled. Any help? :-)
I believe this is a known problem with the nvidia drivers. They're not f/oss, so there's not much we can do. Try disabling compiz.
i am completely sure that disabling compiz will fix the problem. :)   but im sure there must be SOME workaround... :D
you can edit the Wiki yourself. To submit a change request for an ubottu factoid, /msg ubottu !no, <factoid> is <new factoid text>
